content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 19 Nov 2018Has anyone transferred Shopback cashback to a PayPal account before? Is there any payment or transfer charge incurred? Would it be the same amount as withdrawing to the bank account?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Cindy JunovicaLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 19 Nov 2018Hi there!Cindy from ShopBack here :)No additional charge when you make withdrawal from ShopBack!For more questions, feel free to join our FB group here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/TheSmarterWay/Cheers! 0 comments2

Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 20 Nov 2018Hi, there are no charges when you withdraw your cashback accumulated from Shopback to PayPal. But when you withdraw funds from your PayPal balance into your Singapore bank account, there is a $1 fee if you withdraw less than $200. https://www.paypal.com/sg/webapps/mpp/get-started-with-paypal0 comments1
